other_tests.findings: Keratinocytic atypia consistent with actinic keratosis; atypical melanocytic hyperplasia (insufficient for diagnosis of LM)

other_tests.changes_over_time: Progressed to LMM (Breslow thickness 0.2 mm, Clark level II)

other_tests.findings: LM arising in a seborrheic keratosis
other_tests.changes_over_time: Confirmed diagnosis of LM upon re-excision
